title: Arabic 16
text: Forget all save Me and commune with My spirit. This is of the essence of My command, therefore turn unto it.

prev.title: Arabic 15
prev.text: Turn thy face unto Mine and renounce all save Me; for My sovereignty endureth and My dominion perisheth not. If thou seekest another than Me, yea, if thou searchest the universe forevermore, thy quest will be in vain.

next.title: Arabic 17
next.text: Be thou content with Me and seek no other helper. For none but Me can ever suffice thee.
